channel.title: Item on NPC?
channel.description: What case is it for Item on NPC in Delta? Adding 100% sheep shearer quest and I need a method to shear the sheep soo :3

item.title: Item on NPC?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Well can someone actually help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Item on NPC?
item.dc:creator: @_onster мonster
item.description:
@_onster wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:3, topic:404634”][quote author=мonster link=topic=501648.msg3670367#msg3670367 date=1310873385]
Use "System.out.println(“Unhandled Packet: " + packetType);” to print the packet type whilst using the item on NPC in game.

You will obviously need to add the method to suit your server.
[/quote]
He doesn’t want a line to print in the run cmd…

What do you want the player/sheep to do when you use the item on the sheep?[/quote]
Hehe, proves tiredness is the main cause for loss of concentration. I think that’s what I wanted it to say.

Read full topic

item.title: Item on NPC?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

^ This. I know how to make the method to make the player shear the sheep. I just have no idea on where to put it, since my server doesn’t seem to have any Item on NPC at the moment. As already stated my base is Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Item on NPC?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:3, topic:404634”][quote author=мonster link=topic=501648.msg3670367#msg3670367 date=1310873385]
Use "System.out.println(“Unhandled Packet: " + packetType);” to print the packet type whilst using the item on NPC in game.

You will obviously need to add the method to suit your server.
[/quote]
He doesn’t want a line to print in the run cmd…

What do you want the player/sheep to do when you use the item on the sheep?[/quote]
sheep shearer, use a shear to sheer the sheep of it’s fur.
